fist.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the hand when it is tightly closed, so that the fingers are curled in towards the palm. People close their hand in a fist when they are angry or are going to hit someone
fist.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: She held the money tightly in her fist.
Malcolm clenched his fist  (=held his fist very tightly closed) angrily.
Dooley stood up and shook his fist in her face.
Varney slammed his fist down onto the table so hard the dishes jumped.
